name: Oozou
description:
We work in a very agile and iterative manner. We put a lot of focus on User Experience, code quality, testing and performance.
We work with many US and European companies as well as regional companies. This gives us a much wider feel for current trends, both in design and development techniques, tools and technology. We bring this knowledge to every customer we work with to ensure the best results for their projects.
Through our reputation we are able to attract the absolute best talent, both in Thailand and from overseas. The result of which is a very capable team of experts with a proven track record of delivering and exceeding our customers expectations. We provide an environment where staff are continually encouraged to learn and share knowledge.
